title: Ecovillage Schema
description: A schema to add Ecovillages to the Murmurations Index and GEN maps

name.title: Ecovillage Name
name.description: The full name of the ecovillage

primary_url.title: Primary URL
primary_url.description: The unique and definitive website address for the ecovillage (e.g., my-ecovillage.org or some-host.net/my-ecovillage)

tags.title: Tags/Network Memberships
tags.description: Keywords that describe the ecovillage and GEN Memberships e.g. GEN National Network, GEN Region, GEN Transnational Network, Partner Network.

community_type.title: Community type
community_type.description: How does your community identify itself? (Select up to 5 options or select “Unspecified, Other” if none apply)

terms.title: Terms
terms.description: To list your ecovillage you must agree to the following terms by checking the box below: All data given is, to the best of my knowledge, correct and up to date. Apart from private contact data, I consent to GEN listing this information on its website and sharing it with third parties. GEN, at it's sole discretion, may amend or remove this listing. I will use reasonable efforts to keep this data up to date.

urls.title: Other URLs
urls.description: URLs for the ecovillage's other websites, social media, etc.

description.title: Description
description.description: A short description of the ecovillage

mission.title: Mission/Purpose
mission.description: A short statement of why the ecovillage exists and its goals

status.title: Status
status.description: The current status of the ecovillage

full_address.title: Full Address
full_address.description: The complete address of the ecovillage in a single text field as you would write it on an envelope, including the street address, city, postal code, country, etc.

country_iso_3166.title: Country (2 letters)
country_iso_3166.description: The two-letter country code according to the ISO 3166-1 standard where the ecovillage is located

geolocation.title: Geolocation Coordinates
geolocation.description: The geo-coordinates (latitude & longitude) of the primary location of the ecovillage

image.title: Image/Logo
image.description: An image URL (starting with https:// or http://) preferably a square - will display at the top of your listing.

images.title: Other images
images.description: URLs for other images (starting with https:// or http://) e.g. a header image (2000px wide x 1000px tall) and gallery images showing what life is like at your community.

rss.title: RSS URL
rss.description: A URL (starting with https:// or http://) for the Really Simple Syndication feed for the ecovillage (usually found at a URL such as https://my-ecovillage.org/feed)

contact_details.title: Contact Details
contact_details.description: The contact details for the ecovillage
